verses.name: Jeremiah 46:16
verses.text: He made many to fall, yea, one fell upon another: and they said, Arise, and let us go again to our own people, and to the land of our nativity, from the oppressing sword.

verses.name: Jeremiah 46:17
verses.text: They did cry there, Pharaoh king of Egypt is but a noise; he hath passed the time appointed.

verses.name: Jeremiah 46:18
verses.text: As I live, saith the King, whose name is the Lord of hosts, Surely as Tabor is among the mountains, and as Carmel by the sea, so shall he come.
